sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { withRouter } from 'react-router' import { Form, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; class CreateItem extends Component { constructor() { super(); } onSubmitHandler(e) { e.preventDefault() let data = { item_name: e.target.item_name.value, unit_price: e.target.unit_price.value, quantity: e.target.quantity.value, price_ceiling: e.target.price_ceiling.value, price_floor: e.target.price_floor.value, description: e.target.description.value, category_id: e.target.category_id.value, time_limit_min: e.target.time_limit_min.value, merchant_id: e.target.merchant_id.value } console.log(data) fetch('/newListing', { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }) .then(res => res.json() ).then(res => { console.log(res) this.props.onClick(); // this.props.history.push("/") }) } render() { return (
this.onSubmitHandler(e)} method="post"> Item Name
Unit Price
Quantity
Maximum Price
Minimum Price
Category
Description
Duration ) } } export default withRouter(CreateItem)
